name: Shape Shooter (Lenz60)
description:
Simplified Bullet Dodging game

In this game you have to dodge the bullet that shapes fired on you. You can also shoot bullets !. Kill as many of shapes you found and get the highest score ! 

Features :

  • Randomly dropped Power up to upgrade your  bullets and add Lives
  • Everytime you got killed your bullet reduce 1 
  • Infinity levels ! 
  • Time  based levels 

Good Luck
